animeTitle: Yankee-kun na Yamada-kun to Megane-chan to Majo
animeDescription: The official website for the Yamada-kun and the Seven Witches television anime series revealed on Sunday that the anime's first Blu-ray Disc and DVD box sets will include a Yankee-kun to Megane-chan collaborative manga and anime.   (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Yankee-kun na Yamada-kun to Megane-chan to Majo', 'Yamada-kun to 7-nin no Majo (TV)']
